Introduction.Title: Introduction
Introduction.Text: Welcome to Ecodouche. We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting any personal information you may provide through our mobile application.

Data Collected.Title: Data Collected
Data Collected.Text: We do not collect any personally identifiable information (PII) or any other data about the users of our application. This includes, but is not limited to, names, addresses, phone numbers, email addresses, or any other personal data.

Data Usage.Title: Data Usage
Data Usage.Text: Since we do not collect any user data, we do not use, share, or store such information.

Cookies and Similar Technologies.Title: Cookies and Similar Technologies
Cookies and Similar Technologies.Text: Our application does not use cookies or similar technologies to collect data or track user activity.

Data Sharing.Title: Data Sharing
Data Sharing.Text: We do not share any user data with third parties, as we do not collect any data.

Data Security.Title: Data Security
Data Security.Text: Although we do not collect any user data, we take measures to ensure the security and protection of our application against any unauthorized access attempts.

Changes to This Privacy Policy.Title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
Changes to This Privacy Policy.Text: We may update our privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new privacy policy on this page. You are advised to review this privacy policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this privacy policy are effective when they are posted on this page.

Contact Us.Title: Contact Us
Contact Us.Text:
If you have any questions about this privacy policy, you can contact us at:

 cyril.dai.dev@gmail.com

Thank you for using Ecodouche.
